select v.month from ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01') AS `month` UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT((CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m-01') AS `month` UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT((CURDATE() - INTERVAL 2 MONTH), '%Y-%m-01') AS `month` UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT((CURDATE() - INTERVAL 3 MONTH), '%Y-%m-01') AS `month` UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT((CURDATE() - INTERVAL 4 MONTH), '%Y-%m-01') AS `month` ) v GROUP BY month

select ifnull(b.count,0) count from ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m') AS `month` UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT((CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS `month` UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT((CURDATE() - INTERVAL 2 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS `month` UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT((CURDATE() - INTERVAL 3 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS `month` UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT((CURDATE() - INTERVAL 4 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS `month` ) as v left join (select left(o_time,7) as 'month',count(*) as count from `order`,order_dishes_bind where DATE_FORMAT(`order`.o_time,'%Y-%m')> DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval 5 month),'%Y-%m') and order_dishes_bind.o_id = order.order_id and order.o_state=3 and order_dishes_bind.d_id in (select dishes_id from dishes where d_store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}) GROUP BY month ) as b on v.month = b.month group by v.month

select ifnull(b.count,0) count from ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m') AS `month` UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT((CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS `month` UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT((CURDATE() - INTERVAL 2 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS `month` UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT((CURDATE() - INTERVAL 3 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS `month` UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT((CURDATE() - INTERVAL 4 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS `month` ) as v left join (select left(o_time,7) as 'month',count(*)/(SELECT count(*) FROM store) as count from `order`,order_dishes_bind where DATE_FORMAT(`order`.o_time,'%Y-%m')> DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval 5 month),'%Y-%m') and order_dishes_bind.o_id = order.order_id and order.o_state=3 and order_dishes_bind.d_id in (select dishes_id from dishes) GROUP BY month ) as b on v.month = b.month group by v.month
